name: Code
shortDescription: A component for displaying code snippets.
accessibilityGuidelines: Ensure code content is announced properly by screen readers
Use appropriate contrast for code readability
usageGuidelines: Consider code block vs inline code
contentGuidelines: Use meaningful variable names in examples

name: CodeBlock
shortDescription: A component for displaying multi-line code blocks with syntax highlighting.
accessibilityGuidelines: Ensure code blocks are announced properly by screen readers
Use appropriate contrast for code readability
usageGuidelines: Specify appropriate language for syntax highlighting
Consider code block sizing and scrolling
Use for code snippets that need formatting
contentGuidelines: Use meaningful variable names in examples
Keep code blocks focused and relevant
